Title: Pelts
Plot: Pelts is an erotic tale about stolen raccoon pelts that take violent revenge on those who seek to wear them.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Meat Loaf, John Saxon, Ellen Ewusie, Link Baker, Brenda McDonald, Michal Suchanek, Emilio Salituro, Elise Lew
